description:
This is a market on whether Lewis Hamilton will finish ahead of Max Verstappen in the Formula 1 STC Saudi Arabian Grand Prix 2021, scheduled to take place on December 5, 2021. 

The market will resolve to “Yes” If Lewis Hamilton finishes ahead of Max Verstappen, and “No” otherwise. 

If for any reason the Saudi Arabian Grand Prix is rescheduled to a date on or before December 31, 2021, the same market conditions will apply. 

If the Saudi Arabian Grand Prix is rescheduled to a date after December 31, 2021, the market will resolve 50-50. 

- If Lewis Hamilton finishes the race but Max Verstappen does not, or does not compete at all, the market will resolve to “Yes.” 
- If Max Verstappen finishes the race but Lewis Hamilton does not, or does not compete at all, the market will resolve to “No.” 
- If neither Lewis Hamilton nor Max Verstappen finish the race, then the market will resolve to 50-50.

markets.question: Will Lewis Hamilton finish ahead of Max Verstappen in the Saudi Arabian Gran Prix?
